page.title: 06THE CO-OP IN BROUGHTON.
page.content: ON 13th JUNE WE INTERVIEWED A SHOP ASSISTANT AT THE CO-OP. WE FOUND OUT THAT THEY GET LOTS OF CUSTOMERS.IT WAS BUILT IN THE 1950s.FOUR PEOPLE WORK AT THE CO-OP.IT HAS ONLY BEEN A CO-OP. OPENING AND CLOSING TIMES DAY OPEN CLOSE SUN. - - MON. 9.00a.m.12.30 p.m. TUE. 9.00a.m. 5.30 p.m. WED. 8.30a.m. 5.30 p.m. THU. 8.30a.m. 5.30 p.m. FRI. 8.30a.m. 6.00 p.m. SAT. 8.30a.m.12.45 p.m.. PEOPLE BUY PET FOOD THE MOST.THEY SELL A LOT OF SUGAR AND TEA.THURSDAY AND FRIDAY ARE THE BUSIEST DAYS.THEY DO NOT GET MANY CUSTOMERS ON WEDNESDAY.THEIR BIGGEST PROBLEM IS TAKING THE THINGS INTO THE SHOP FROM THE STORE ROOM.THEY LIKE WORKING IN A SHOP.THEY DO NOT LIKE CHANGING THE PRICES.
